about_the_game:
• You are reincarnated into a valley full of spiritual energy, using the Eight Trigrams Formation to complete the automated production of elixirs, and exploring the past stories of this continent in the world of monsters and monsters

  • Make good use of the herbs in your hand to refine various imaginative elixirs, and use them to collect various resources, fight monsters, hunt, and even fry fish

  • Building systems, building your own home

  • Modular automation system, simpler automation implementation, to meet daily monster fighting needs of pills

  • Day and night alternate, and traveling at night may require bringing lights, as well as other monsters that do not appear during the day

  • Magic Treasure System, refining your own magic treasures, presenting different postures based on the materials

name: Dan Factory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
